name: Snowman Build & Battle
description:
This is the barebones start of our holiday Snowman Build & Battle prototype.

Over 12 days this game will be updated every day with the final release on Christmas day.

We are excited to watch this project grow with all of you together!

Day One

Workshop skeleton design begins with the plan to make one super snowman mech with which to battle with and against your friends. 

Day Two

Basic images for most of the types has been made to get started building the snowmen. Changed to making smaller snowmen to build an army with the player, snowman Mech plans reserved for the future.
